official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to deny Federal retirement annuities to individuals convicted of any felony, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Denies pension and survivor's annuity benefits in the case of any Federal employee who is convicted of any felony which directly involved his or her Federal employment or who remains outside the United States to avoid prosecution for any such felony.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to deny Federal retirement annuities to individuals convicted of any felony, and for other purposes.
